custom_nodes.author: hetima
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-SingleLinePicker
custom_nodes.description: Select one line from the text list with a single click. It dramatically improves the process of switching LoRA or prompts.

custom_nodes.author: liewcc
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Qwen-Canvas
custom_nodes.description: Enforces Qwen's training resolution buckets for precise Latent space generation.

custom_nodes.author: FNGarvin
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Auto Model Downloader
custom_nodes.description: Convenient, high-speed model downloads directly to your Comfy install with blazing-fast, multi-connection support. No more downloading models to your downloads folder and having to manually move them to the proper folder!

custom_nodes.author: c0dezer019
custom_nodes.title: Pausable Sampler
custom_nodes.description: Modifed Sampler nodes that allow you to pause/resume generations. For those with older hardware running in CPU mode or old GPUs. Useful for managing thermals.

custom_nodes.author: mingyi456
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI DFloat11 Extended
custom_nodes.description: Fork of the official DF11 ComfyUI custom node that supports a wider variety of model architectures, and provides fixes for compatibility with recent ComfyUI versions. Also, LoRAs are supported for select model architectures.

custom_nodes.author: Urabewe
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AudioTools
custom_nodes.description: Audio normalization and enhancement nodes for ComfyUI (LUFS normalization, audio processing utilities).

custom_nodes.author: aledelpho
custom_nodes.title: Arthemy Live Tuner - Z-image
custom_nodes.description: Advanced real-time control for Z-Image models and Qwen3-4B Text Encoders. These nodes allow you to change your model's weights to boost or lower specific generative phases.

custom_nodes.author: CrateTools
custom_nodes.title: Preview Video Monitor Pro
custom_nodes.description: Second monitor preview for video generations with interactive playback controls, color tools, generation tracking, and workflow-embedded snapshots.

custom_nodes.author: loficoding
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Node HUD
custom_nodes.description: Adds a smart I/O status dock to stacked nodes for cleaner layouts.

custom_nodes.author: room3dev
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-I2VChainHelper
custom_nodes.description: Helps filter and trim image batches for I2V chaining by ensuring consistent face identity and eye openness.

custom_nodes.author: laowang
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI PixelArt Converter
custom_nodes.description: Convert images to pixel art using ONNX models.

custom_nodes.author: sjhddh
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Cyber-Steganography
custom_nodes.description: Cyberpunk/Spy-craft steganography nodes for ComfyUI. Hide secret text messages inside AI-generated images using LSB (Least Significant Bit) steganography. Features encryption with optional password key. Nodes: StegoEncode (hide text), StegoDecode (reveal text).

custom_nodes.author: pixelpainter
custom_nodes.title: UI-Decorators [SubGraph]
custom_nodes.description: UI Decorators is a set of 4 nodes to enhance frontside SubGraph usability and organization. A Note, a Divider, an editable Spacer, and a Title node. Includes color pickers for fonts, font sizing, bold/non-bold text, and background color picker for the note

custom_nodes.author: Xz3r0
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Xz3r0-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Some custom nodes: XMath, XResolution, XImageSave, XVideoSave, XLatentLoad, XLatentSave ...and more

custom_nodes.author: mickmumpitz
custom_nodes.title: Mickmumpitz-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI by Mickmumpitz.

custom_nodes.author: room3dev
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PixelForge
custom_nodes.description: Dynamic resolution selector and advanced resize nodes with real-time feedback.

custom_nodes.author: gen1nya
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Remote Upscale
custom_nodes.description: Offload image upscaling to a remote server with a dedicated GPU. Real-time progress streaming via SSE.

custom_nodes.author: martin-rizzo
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ZImagePowerNodes
custom_nodes.description: A set of ComfyUI nodes designed and fine-tuned specifically for the Z-Image model. Pushing the best image generation model to its limits!

custom_nodes.author: 0dot77
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-annotations
custom_nodes.description: A lightweight annotation overlay for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: ato-zen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-VIBE
custom_nodes.description: Implementation of VIBE (Visual Instruction Based Editor) as a custom node for ComfyUI that enables image editing using natural language instructions leveraging Sana1.5 and Qwen3-VL models.

custom_nodes.author: FallenIncursio
custom_nodes.title: arcenciel-link-comfyui

custom_nodes.author: capitan01R

custom_nodes.description: Conditioning enhancement node for FLUX.2 Klein 9B in ComfyUI. Controls prompt adherence and image edit behavior by modifying the active text embedding region.

custom_nodes.author: rookiestar28
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TranslateGemma
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that translates text (including prompts) using Google's open-weight TranslateGemma models.

custom_nodes.author: BigStationW
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-AD-Image-Concatenation-Advanced
custom_nodes.description: Advanced image concatenation node for ComfyUI with flexible grid layouts, padding, and styling options.

custom_nodes.description: Advanced Text Encode node for ComfyUI with dynamic multi-image reference support.

custom_nodes.author: loz2754

custom_nodes.description: A collection of workflow helper nodes focused on organization + control (bypass/mute/collapse/group control), prompt/text utilities, file/path helpers, and image/video save helpers (optional VHS integration).

custom_nodes.author: SergPoletaev
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-SPoletNodes
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for image preview and saving

custom_nodes.author: capitan01R
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-CapitanZiT-Scheduler
custom_nodes.description: A lightweight ComfyUI custom scheduler & sigma generator for Z-Image-Turbo. Delivers a stable linear sigma schedule (1.0 â†’ 0.0) for rectified-flow/flow-matching, boosting few-step generation (8-9 steps) with superior consistency, reduced noise, and full compatibility with the model's distilled pipeline.

custom_nodes.author: joe002
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-deterministic-nodes
custom_nodes.description: Batch-invariant inference nodes for guaranteed reproducibility in ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: joe002
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-conduit-optimizer
custom_nodes.description: Non-linear inference optimization for ComfyUI: 4-tier VRAM, speculative generation, precision routing

custom_nodes.author: joe002
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-rtx4090-nodes
custom_nodes.description: High-performance ComfyUI nodes optimized for RTX 4090: batch processing, memory management, GPU monitoring

custom_nodes.author: Yahweasel
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-HF-Diffusers
custom_nodes.description: A lot of custom nodes for ComfyUI are really just bindings to HuggingFace Diffusers and/or Transformers, but overly constrained to use them in very particular ways.

custom_nodes.author: SKBv0

custom_nodes.author: Nakamura2828

custom_nodes.author: sgyyao

custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that uses various LLM APIs (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, DeepSeek, Qwen/DashScope, xAI, etc.) to optimize and expand your image generation prompts.

custom_nodes.author: naku-yh
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Flux2ImageReference
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive node for ComfyUI that implements an image reference mechanism for Flux2-based image generation models.

custom_nodes.author: transcendedhacker
custom_nodes.title: Mode_personal_node
custom_nodes.description: Massive scalable SDXL/Flux prompt system with 300+ atomic options.

custom_nodes.author: skatardude10
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Optical-Realism
custom_nodes.description: Physics-based post-processing using depth maps to simulate atmospheric perspective, light transport, and lens imperfections for photorealistic results.

custom_nodes.author: Aloukik21

custom_nodes.author: ai-joe-git

custom_nodes.author: ai-joe-git
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Simple-Prompt-Batcher
custom_nodes.description: A simple and efficient ComfyUI custom node that allows batch processing of multiple prompts in a single queue with automatic model loading optimization.

custom_nodes.author: aledelpho
custom_nodes.title: Arthemy Live Tuner - SDXL
custom_nodes.description: Advanced live tuning nodes for SDXL, Illustrious, and NAI. Slice U-Net and CLIP into functional areas to adjust intensity of specific components like Layout, Style, or Syntax.

custom_nodes.author: bkpaine1
custom_nodes.title: Halo-Lipsy
custom_nodes.description: AMD unified memory lip sync for ComfyUI. Native Wav2Lip inference with no subprocesses - finally works on Strix Halo, ROCm, and all AMD APUs. Features sync tuning, edge blending, and safe tensor casting for unified memory systems.

custom_nodes.author: kianthos
custom_nodes.title: Earthbound---All-in-one-ComfyUI-Node
custom_nodes.description: Comprehensive single-node solution for ComfyUI integrating base generation, latent refinement, neural upscaling, and post-processing.

custom_nodes.author: tackcrypto1031
custom_nodes.title: tk_comfyui_view_and_light
custom_nodes.description: TK View and Light: A ComfyUI node for 3D camera and lighting control

custom_nodes.author: XelaNull

custom_nodes.author: Aditya Mundhalia

custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for integrating Ollama local LLM models with image or text generation workflows.

custom_nodes.author: Setmaster

custom_nodes.description: Track model usage frequency to identify abandoned or underutilized models. Shows usage stats, file sizes, and highlights stale models in a sidebar panel.

custom_nodes.author: maximilianwicen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MaxTools
custom_nodes.description: A small collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI, featuring Max Quick Image Size node for image-to-image or image-to-video workflows. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: bhhtr12
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ollama-stop
custom_nodes.description: Passthrough node that instantly unloads any running ollama model mid workflow. No API calls, just accepts plain string as a model name and executes 'ollama stop <model>' command in your system.

custom_nodes.author: DemonAlone
custom_nodes.title: SimpeStringGenerator_ComfyUI

custom_nodes.title: comfyui-segs-profile
